duties_responsibilities.duty: Formulate system scope through research and fact-finding to develop or modify moderately complex information systems.
Evaluate and implement changes to existing system logic difficulties and documentation as necessary.
Review flow charts, models, and procedures to design possible system solutions.
Collaborate with system analysts, engineers, and programmers to design systems and to determine project limitations and capabilities.
Identify and document all system constraints, implications, and consequences of various proposed system changes.
Educate end users on system designs and functionalities through creation of training materials and conducting demos.
Evaluate the efficiency and effectiveness of application operations and troubleshooting problems.
Analyze functional needs and drive the design for positive business outcomes; recommend solutions aligned with business/IT strategies and compliance with corporate architectural standards.
Proficiency with scripting and automation - i.e. Batch, Postman, or PowerShell.
Proficiency in troubleshooting and root cause analysis (RCA) of complex technical issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
